title: #28 - That Episode Where Maria and Her Husband Talk About 2020
description:
It’s the end of the year, and you’re in for a special treat.

This week, Maria welcomes her husband, George. The two of them talk about what 2020 has been like for them as a couple and as a family. Plus, they share some books and shows they’ve enjoyed through the pandemic that you might use to relax this week. 

To learn how Maria can help you find love in 2021, go to: https://linktr.ee/agapematch

Follow Maria on Instagram Follow Maria on TikTok Have a question for Maria? Visit http://askamatchmaker.com Enroll in Agape Match’s Group Coaching Intensive: https://agapematch.com/events To learn more about how Maria and how her team can help you find love, visit agapematch.com
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
